title: Tour de Mayen
text: The Tour de Mayen (2,326 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Swiss%20Prealps">Swiss Prealps</a>, located north of <a href="Leysin">Leysin</a> in the canton of <a href="Vaud">Vaud</a>. It lies east of the <a href="Tour%20d%27A%C3%AF">Tour d'Aï</a>, on the range lying between the <a href="Lac%20de%20l%27Hongrin">lake of Hongrins</a> and the valley of <a href="Ormont%20Dessous">Ormont Dessous</a> and <a href="Ormont%20Dessus">Ormont Dessus</a>.
